name: Ext_R5_SpecimenDefinition_url
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.SpecimenDefinition.url for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents SpecimenDefinition.url from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SpecimenDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Logical canonical URL to reference this SpecimenDefinition (globally unique)
element.definition: An absolute URL that is used to identify this SpecimenDefinition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this SpecimenDefinition is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the SpecimenDefinition. For more information see Technical and Business Versions.
